# Overview
Random Tab Refresher is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that automatically refreshes your selected tab at random intervals between 40 seconds and 3 minutes. Ideal for keeping dynamic content up-to-date or monitoring live data without manual intervention.

# Features
Random Intervals: Refreshes the selected tab at random intervals ranging from 40 seconds to 3 minutes.

Tab-Specific Control: Easily start or stop refreshing for individual tabs without affecting others.

Simplest: Simple toggle button to start and stop the automatic refresh.

Real-Time Updates: Displays the time since the last refresh directly in the extension popup.

Lightweight: Minimal impact on browser performance, ensuring smooth operation.


# How It Works
Open the Extension: Click on the Random Tab Refresher icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Select a Tab: The extension will apply to the currently active tab.

Toggle Refreshing: Click "Start Refreshing" to enable random refreshing for the selected tab. Click "Stop Refreshing" to disable it

Monitor Refresh Time: View the time since the last refresh in the extension popup.

# Use Cases
Live Monitoring: Perfect for keeping track of live stock prices, sports scores, or news feeds.

Web Development: Useful for developers who need to see real-time updates on web pages during testing.

Online Auctions: Stay up-to-date with the latest bids without manually refreshing the page.

# Privacy and Security
Random Tab Refresher does not collect any personal data or browsing history. It operates locally within your browser, ensuring complete privacy and security.
